meta.title: Exclusive Private Transport | Comfort & Personal Chauffeurs
meta.description: Private transport with certified chauffeurs. Ideal for airport transfers, day trips, evening rides and luxury private journeys. Available 24/7.

hero.title: Exclusive private transport
hero.subtitle: We provide private transport with experienced drivers and luxury vehicles. Perfect for airport transfers, private trips and special occasions.

filosofie.title: Private transport with the care of a personal chauffeur
filosofie.description: We believe every ride should be a pleasant experience ‚Äî discreet, comfortable and fully tailored to your wishes. Always on time. Always refined. Always exclusive.

discreet.title: Discreet, professionally dressed drivers
discreet.description: Selected for etiquette, driving style and confidentiality. Your privacy always comes first.

vehicles.title: Luxury vehicles: Mercedes E, S & V-Class
vehicles.description: Representative cars with optimal legroom, quiet cabins and premium finishes.

ontime.title: Punctual and reliable, 24/7
ontime.description: We plan ahead and monitor in real time so you arrive on time without stress.

service.title: Personalised service on request
service.description: From drinks and music to route preferences: every ride is tailored to your wishes.

vloot.title: Choose your comfort level
vloot.subtitle: Every ride deserves comfort, style and luxury.

section.title: How can we help you?
section.description: From important appointments to a relaxing night out ‚Äî we offer private transport that fits your life and wishes.

airport.title: Private airport transfers
airport.subtitle: To and from Schiphol
airport.description: Your journey begins and ends in peace. We monitor your flight, adjust to delays and are ready when you arrive. No rush, no stress ‚Äî only comfort.
highlights: Meet & greet in the arrivals hall

dinner.title: Evening & dinner transport
dinner.subtitle: Enjoy without worries
dinner.description: An evening out should be carefree. We bring you to your restaurant, theatre or gala ‚Äî and pick you up when you're ready.

events.title: Event & concert transport
events.subtitle: Arrive in style
events.description: Whether it‚Äôs a concert, musical or sporting event ‚Äî arrive relaxed and leave without crowds. We take care of everything around your transport.
highlights: Ideal for groups up to 7 people

daytrips.title: Luxury day trips & weekend transport
daytrips.subtitle: Explore at your own pace
daytrips.description: A day out or a weekend away? Let us handle the driving. We bring you to your destination and remain available for adjustments along the way.

chauffeur.title: Chauffeur service
chauffeur.subtitle: For your own vehicle
chauffeur.description: Prefer to travel in your own car? Our experienced chauffeurs drive your vehicle so you can work, relax or enjoy the company.

business.title: Business transfers
business.subtitle: Your mobile workspace
business.description: Turn travel time into working time. With WiFi, charging options and a quiet environment, you stay productive between appointments.

ladiesTaxi.title: Ladies Taxi
ladiesTaxi.subtitle: Safe transport for women
ladiesTaxi.description: Our Ladies Taxi service offers extra safety, discretion and comfort ‚Äî with professional female drivers.

cta.missingDescription: Any type of transport you need, we can arrange. Contact us and tell us your wishes ‚Äî we are happy to think along with you.

pricing.title: Private transport rates
pricing.subtitle: Choose the comfort level that fits your journey.

corporate.name: VIP
corporate.description: For special occasions and important guests.

footer.included: All rides include VAT and standard waiting time.
